summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewer along the following described route, to-wit: McGraw Street from a connection with the existing sewer on 8th Avenue North to a point approximately 169th feet west of Taylor Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8145 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and adopting the maps, plans and specifications for such improvement.
